item.title: ~~tete blocking mage book teles~~
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

For new tele’s make it when they click the button(case (number of button) it teleports them.

Example: the varrock teleport.

case 4140: //ID of the button. teleportToX = 3210; //X coords of the teleport. teleportToY = 3424; //Y coords of the teleport. sendMessage("You teleport to Varrock!"); //Message sent on teleport. break; //Break

and for teleblock you need to make an int, something like

public int teleBlock = 0;

where all the rest of your players int’s are and make the teleblock command set their teleBlock to 1. With all the tele commands change them to something like:

case 4140: if(player.teleBlock == 1) { //* teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; sendMessage("You teleport to Varrock!"); } else { sendMessage("You cannot teleport at the moment."); } break;

  • = I don’t know if that will work because I’m unsure of the source your using and client version so it may differ depending on how it calls the player.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~tete blocking mage book teles~~
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

[size=20pt]ok how can i tele block all these. also how do i add new teles as well[/size]

[code]
case 185: // clicking most buttons
server.prayerHandler.clickPrayer(playerId);
actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {
println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId);
}
switch (actionButtonId) {
case 28164:
case 4150:
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Camelot!”);
break;
case 29031:
teleportToX = 2606;
teleportToY = 3093;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Yanille!”);
break;
case 4146:
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3378;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Falador!”);
break;
case 4140:
teleportToX = 3210;
teleportToY = 3424;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Varrock!”);
break;
case 4143:
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Lumbridge!”);
break;
case 6004:
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3305;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Ardougne!”);
break;
case 28165:
case 28166:
case 28168:
case 28215:
case 28171:
case 28170:
case 28172:
case 28178:
break;

        case 28173:
        case 28174:
        case 28169:
        case 28175:
        case 28167:
        case 28176:
        case 28177:
        case 28179:
        case 28180:
            break; [/code]
